title: The Solar system (MAC & PC)
creator_credit: Educational Media International, Kodak Education Program and Ken J. Widdowson
brief_description: Adapted from a video produced by David Widdowson of Astrovisuals, which provide over 100 spectacular high quality images from NASA, CSIRO, the European Space Agency, and the United States Naval Observatory. The CD-ROM may be used either in the classroom or for private use at home and covers subjects such as evolution of the solar system, evidence of water, ice, volcanoes and atmosphere of the planets, exploring space and cosmic impacts.
